title: [Temple Burrow, Oleani Way]
description: Near to the entrance to Hope Alley, three small cottages sit at a bend in the way.  Two occupy the south side of the lane, residing behind a wall carved with roses and stylized hearts.  The third, it appears, is being slowly overrun by the glacier.  An outcropping of solid ice jabs out over the rooftop, jutting from the glacier proper.  The owners seem little deterred by the intrusion, having dug a small upper story into the ice.

Three small cottages sit here, two on the south side of the lane.  The third, it appears, is being slowly overrun by the glacier.  A thick slab of ice rests atop it, extending from the glacier proper.  The owners do not seem put off by this, as they have built a small upper story in the ice.
